site1.title: Welcome
site1.description:
prixradio: <1 - 96>
prixnormal: Set a voice channel.

Have you an issue or the Bot is offline? Join our support server:

site2.title: Music
site2.description:
prixshuffle: Shuffle the queue
prixloop: loop the Queue
prixvolume 0-200
prixskipto: <number>
prixskip: skip a song
prixresume: Resume stop
prixqueue: What's in the Queue?
prixpause: paused the Music
prixfilter: <Filter>
prixradio: 1 - 96
prixplay: <Youtube Song>
prixstop: Stop the music
prixstream: <mp3 stream>
prixrandom: play a random Mp3
prixnowplaying: Show your audio that's playing now.

site3.title: Settings
site3.description:
prixnormal: set an usual channel
prixresetnormal: Reset the usual channel
prixsetprefix: set a new prefix
prixprefix: shows you prefix
resetprefix: resets your prefix
